title: A new DSL to set cluster-wide preferences on how to allocate replicas to nodes
description:
The DSL lets user sets preferences and conditions on how replica should be created on nodes


Conditions
 these are hard rules which are evaluated first and must be met at all times unless specifically marked as non-strict in which case the system tries to fulfil the condition on a best effort basis

h2: Preferences: these are sorting rules
